step.para: Click the Storage tab. The Storage list and toolbar display.
Click the New Domain button. The New Domain dialog box appears.
Enter a Name for the Storage Domain.
Select the Data Center the Storage Domain must be attached to. The Data Center selected must be of type POSIX (POSIX compliant FS).
Select a host from the Use Host list. Only hosts within the selected Data Center will be listed. The host that you selet will be used to connect the Storage Domain.
Enter the Path to the POSIX filesystem, as you would normally provide it to the mount command.
Enter the VFS Type, as you would normally provide it to the mount command using the -t argument. See man mount for a list of valid VFS types.

Enter additional Mount Options, as you would normally them to the mount command using the -o argument. The mount options should be provided in a comma separated list. See man mount for a list of valid mount options.
Click OK to attach the new Storage Domain.
